elements.name: rulingTypeCode
elements.description:
An indication as to the type of information provided in the record:

  • A Pre-Classification number, specifically citing the Importer and merchandise, is provided in the Ruling Number.
  • A Pre-Approval number, specifically citing the Importer and merchandise, is provided in the Ruling Number.
  • A Binding Ruling number is provided in the Ruling Number.

options.C: A Pre-Classification number, specifically citing the Importer and merchandise, is provided in the Ruling Number.
options.P: A Pre-Approval number, specifically citing the Importer and merchandise, is provided in the Ruling Number.
options.R: A Binding Ruling number is provided in the Ruling Number.

elements.name: filler1
elements.description: Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the Ruling Number.

elements.name: rulingNumber
elements.description:
The administrative number assigned by CBP to a binding ruling or a ruling under the pre-importation review program (PIRP).

Left justify, space fill.
